attributes.action: Call an Election for 1st May to coincide with the Local Elections
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Mr Blair - we did NOT VOTE FOR MR BROWN - BUT YOU WERE ELECTED FOR A FULL TERM AS PM.
SO FOR THE GOOD OF THE UK AND YOUR SO-CALLED "LEGACY" PLEASE, PLEASE GO TO THE COUNTRY AND LET THEM DECIDE WHO WE WISH FOR OUR FUTURE PRIME MINISTER - NOT SOMEONE WHO HAS NOT BEEN CHOSEN BY US. THIS WOULD NOT ONLY BE FAIR BUT ETHICAL. ANY OTHER OPTION WOULD BE A TRAVESTY OF JUSTICE.  J.H. SWANSEA.

rejection.details: Please redraft without the excessive use of capital letters. They make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
